TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowCompilerParameters extends System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents parameters passed to during the compilation process.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters> class, add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters.LibraryPaths%2A> and set the value for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.OutputAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property. The code also creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler> class and runs the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler.Compile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method. This code assumes that `results` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults>. This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WizardForm.cs file. For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#99](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#99)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#99](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#99)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string[] assemblyNames) cil managed

Docs.param: The names of the assemblies used in compilation.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the names of the assemblies used in compilation.

## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters> class, add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters.LibraryPaths%2A> and set the value for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.OutputAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property. The code also creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler> class and runs the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler.Compile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method. This code assumes that `results` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults>. This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WizardForm.cs file. remarks.format:
## Remarks The compiler adds standard library paths to the collection.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters> class, add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters.LibraryPaths%2A> and set the value for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.OutputAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property. The code also creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler> class and runs the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler.Compile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method. This code assumes that `results` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults>. This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WizardForm.cs file. For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#99](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#99)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#99](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#99)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the collection of code compile units which will be used in this invocation of the workflow compiler.
Docs.value: The collection of code compile units which will be used in this invocation of the workflow compiler.
